: look here https://help.ubuntu.com/community/Installation/Netboot
Download it and ???
What is this netisntall? You mean type this at the boot prompt.
Nah I dont want to do it via install but via local network
Sorry i mean not internet but local network
I have copied the extracted on a pc on my local network
i want to install rest of the computers from there
I have done it before with fedora
it has a netboot image
u can then install it from a nfs/http/ftp server by just providing the ip and path
Ok cool but do i have to boot from a special image so that network install becomes available
: did you read : https://help.ubuntu.com/community/Installation/Netboot
ie i will need mini.iso
Yes i did
